ux_project.title: UI Dashboard Store Signage
ux_project.description: Designing a user-friendly dashboard to manage digital store signage—making it easier to schedule, monitor, and control content across multiple retail locations.

ux_project.title: UX Case Study Gofood Enhancement
ux_project.description: An in-depth case study on optimizing GoFood’s UX. Uncovering user challenges in food ordering, and how thoughtful design solutions boosted customer satisfaction and transaction conversion rates.

ux_project.title: UI Dashboard Traffic & Audience Measurement
ux_project.description: Designing a sleek, data-driven dashboard to monitor ads traffic and audience behavior—turning complex metrics into actionable insights at a glance.

ux_project.title: UX Redesign IKEA Indonesia
ux_project.description: Analyzing pain points and reimagining the user journey for IKEA Indonesia, resulting in a faster, clearer, and more engaging experience that drives both customer satisfaction and sales growth.

ux_project.title: UI / UX Vending Machine Frestea Gratis Campaign
ux_project.description: Designing an intuitive interface and seamless user flow for the Frestea Gratis vending machine campaign—making it effortless (and fun) for people to grab their free drink.

ux_project.title: UX Redesign MajuShop.id
ux_project.description: Redesigning MajuShop.id to make shopping for groceries easier, more informative, and deeply reassuring for every customer.

frontend_project.title: Front-End Store Signage Dashboard
frontend_project.description: Developing a responsive front-end dashboard to manage store signage content—designed for clarity, control, and seamless content distribution across multiple screens.

frontend_project.title: Front-end Dashboard Traffic & Audience Measurement
frontend_project.description: Building a front-end dashboard that transforms complex traffic and audience data into clear, actionable insights—empowering teams to make smarter decisions, faster.

frontend_project.title: Online Recruitment System Prisma Advertising
frontend_project.description: Developing a front-end platform for Prisma Advertising’s online recruitment—delivering a clean, responsive interface that makes applying, screening, and hiring more intuitive for all users.

frontend_project.title: Front-end Vending Machine Frestea Gratis Campaign
frontend_project.description: Developing a front-end platform for Frestea Gratis vending machine campaign—making it effortless (and fun) for people to grab their free drink.

frontend_project.title: Front-end DOOH Dove Hair Tonic Campaign
frontend_project.description: Building a sleek front-end interface for Dove Hair Tonic’s DOOH campaign—turning large screens into interactive experiences that capture attention and drive brand engagement.
